intro: Pterisanthes heterantha, commonly known as the slender pterisanthes, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Araliaceae and is characterized by its compound leaves and small, clustered flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forests and stream sides. Its botanical features include opposite leaf arrangement and a distinctive, fragrant floral scent. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value and has some traditional medicinal uses.
